Articles.Content:
This is a happy little thing that gets up on to the step without any inputs. Fire up the engines, drive to the water with the cheap-o frame. Stage. And go.

In dry mode the thing will cruise at 70m/s at full power. With reheat enabled speeds of more than 100m/s are possible. However, speeds over 110 may lead to flipping.

The best way to use this is to to play with the pitch the trim, you need to trim it out a bit, and then when she's settled she'll eat up the kilometres as you tear along the surface of your favourite ocean.

Included is a cargo bay. Because now it has some semblance of usefulness... Put stuff in there, or swap it for a crew cabin.

1 Toggles the reheat!

You can disable the cockpit's reaction wheels and she still works. Although at low speed you'll need to turn it on for docking.
